txt.en: These fine tusks have a strangely polished feel to them, though you just harvested them from the corpse of a boar you slew. These creatures, like everything else you have encountered in the woods of the Gloomglens, seem to have an otherworldly air to them.\n\nRegardless, you should bring the tusks to one of the Rangers of the Grey Company as evidence of one of the threats posed to them in the Gloomglens.
'These tusks are strangely fair to have been taken from a wild pig, but if this is the strangest thing we shall see in these woods, then I will be glad.'
'Did you find anything during your patrol of the Gloomglens?'
You slew a great boar in the woods of the Gloomglens, harvesting its fine tusks.
Talk to a Ranger at Echad Idhrenfair

There are Rangers at Echad Idhrenfair in the Gloomglens.\n\nYou should bring the boar-tusks you harvested to one of the Rangers of the Grey Company as evidence of the threats posed to them in the Gloomglens.
